query.name: net.cdolinc.staff.employment.records
query.sql: SELECT u_cdol_user_employment.id, u_cdol_user_employment.usersdcid, u_cdol_user_employment.schoolid, CASE WHEN u_cdol_user_employment.schoolid = 0 THEN 'Diocean Office' WHEN u_cdol_user_employment.schoolid = -1 THEN u_cdol_user_employment.school_name ELSE schools.name END AS schooolname, u_cdol_user_employment.assignment, u_cdol_user_employment.emp_start_date, u_cdol_user_employment.emp_end_date, u_cdol_user_employment.epm_fte, u_cdol_user_employment.notes FROM u_cdol_user_employment LEFT JOIN schools ON schools.school_number = u_cdol_user_employment.schoolid WHERE u_cdol_user_employment.usersdcid = :selectedUserDcid OR :selectedUserDcid = 0
